title: No Mystery Gift
body:
I got an animation that I received a mystery gift, but have not received an item. I checked the purchase history on my account and there is no evidence of anything.

Thanks,

replies.body: Oh, my brother got a mystery champion skin on the same day so I though they were related to the teemo event.

It looks like this was likely the *Mark of the Star Guardian Icon* according to what I saw on your account.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
I would have gotten that from the Star Guardian Quiz that was on the website previous to the gifting event
Correct, and these gifts are delivered to your account and display in the same way that mystery gifts do, with a pop-up prompt and everything.
